Articles.Content: Does anyone remember a mod that added a particle effect to the staging event for decouplers? I can't remember if it was just an mm-config or if was a pluggin. I swear a can remember seeing this a few years ago. I'm aware of the animated decouplers mod, but what I am remembering was something that added an effect to all stock and mod parts, not just certain ones.

9 hours ago, Errol said:

Does anyone remember a mod that added a particle effect to the staging event for decouplers? I can't remember if it was just an mm-config or if was a pluggin. I swear a can remember seeing this a few years ago. I'm aware of the animated decouplers mod, but what I am remembering was something that added an effect to all stock and mod parts, not just certain ones.

That was along time back lol  pretty sure it was a plugin that got added to smokescreen , I remember playing around with it
